name: Horror Clown Survival Island
description:
Feel the real horror adventure in this new horror clown survival island game. You are stranded on a haunted island all alone. Equip yourself with weapons as soon as possible and watch out for scary clown roaming around the island. Find a way to kill the clown with your bat or guns. There have been no resident living here in haunted island for so long. Face the scary clown & get rid from the evil ghosts.

Horror spiritual evil spirits are moving around. Your body is filled with chill thoughts. There are no police officers or army commandos or professional ghost hunter to fight your battle. Make them run away before they attack you.

Features:
* Scary and horror Ambience
* Amazing 3D sound effects
* Mysterious Gameplay
* Find and kill scary clown and zombies
